name: Previous Tenant
storyline:
The apartment

Since Markus has settled into his new apartment, he feels comfortable
when the neighbours started talking about that...thing, Markus began having a bad feeling about living in his new home. Even though there was no reason to worry, except for his new neighbours gossiping around he felt...different. As the days passed by he could not stop questioning whether they might be right or not. Markus remembered reading an article in his local newspaper about a man being haunted in his own apartment. They portrayed it as a fake because obviously ghosts and paranormal activities don´t exist, right? Maybe Markus wasn´t the only one wondering about what could possibly happen next. He told himself he had no reason for believing these fairy tales until he got overwhelmed by his concerns. The last thing Markus remembers is waking up in his bathroom with a serious hangover. It also seems like there are some odd noises outside the door but he could not remember giving his neighbours a key to his apartment. He felt nervousness rising up in him. He needed to contact the guy he read about in the newspaper as soon as possible but... all of Markus´belongings are outside the bathroom.
summary:
An indie horror game with an emphasis on sounds and jumpscares, Previous Tenant is not for the faint of heart.
Who can solve the puzzles and explore the stories surrounding the mysterious Previous Tenant?
